pages.text: What if you have friends that you want to have access to your soul. Sounds dangerous to me, but hey, no judgement. $(p)$(p)Just like the other, hold [$(k:use)] for the full duration, you and all other entities within the circle will be transported to the soul that the key is set for.
Similar to the standard key, except you use an ender eye.
pages.title: SoulKey
